City of Redfield |footnotes = }} Redfield is a city in the northeastern part of the U.S. state of South Dakota. It is the county seat of Spink County, and it became a city in 1883. At the 2020 census, 2,214 people lived in the city. == References == == Other websites == *City of Redfield website Category:County seats in South Dakota Category:Cities in South Dakota Category:1883 establishments in Dakota Territory
